message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate its worth. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1500000. If you're interested, let me know and we can discuss the details. If not, I have another interested buyer waiting in the wings.

Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $800000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for this unique item. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must respectfully decline at $1200000. Given my current budget, I can only consider offers closer to $800000. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
